_meta.author: Charley Scholz, ELEV8
_meta.coauthor: Claude 4.6 Opus, Claude Code (coding assistant), Cursor (IDE)
_meta.description: Camera and lens presets for creative prompt engineering

presets.name: 35mm Standard
presets.promptFragment: shot on 35mm lens, natural perspective, versatile field of view
presets.description: The workhorse focal length — close to human eye perspective, equally suited for street, documentary, and environmental portraits

presets.name: 50mm Portrait
presets.promptFragment: shot on 50mm lens, natural field of view, classic portrait perspective, subtle background separation
presets.description: The 'nifty fifty' — closest to human vision, produces clean natural-looking images with gentle compression

presets.name: 85mm Telephoto Portrait
presets.promptFragment: shot on 85mm telephoto portrait lens, beautiful background blur, flattering facial compression, creamy bokeh
presets.description: The gold standard portrait focal length — flattering compression, gorgeous subject separation, and buttery bokeh

presets.name: 24mm Wide Angle
presets.promptFragment: shot on 24mm wide angle lens, expansive field of view, dramatic perspective distortion, deep depth of field
presets.description: Wide angle perspective that exaggerates spatial depth and captures broad scenes with dramatic foreground emphasis

presets.name: Macro Lens
presets.promptFragment: macro photography, extreme close-up, 1:1 magnification, razor-thin depth of field, intricate detail
presets.description: Extreme close-up photography revealing microscopic details invisible to the naked eye, with paper-thin focus planes

presets.name: Tilt-Shift
presets.promptFragment: tilt-shift lens effect, selective focus plane, miniature diorama look, blurred edges
presets.description: Manipulates the focus plane to create a miniature/toy-like effect or correct architectural perspective distortion

presets.name: Fisheye
presets.promptFragment: fisheye lens, extreme barrel distortion, ultra-wide 180-degree field of view, spherical warping
presets.description: Ultra-wide hemispherical lens creating extreme barrel distortion and a 180-degree or greater field of view

presets.name: Anamorphic
presets.promptFragment: anamorphic lens, cinematic horizontal lens flares, oval bokeh, widescreen compression, film-like quality
presets.description: Cinema-grade lens producing the signature horizontal flares, oval bokeh, and widescreen look of Hollywood films

presets.name: Drone / Aerial
presets.promptFragment: aerial drone photography, bird's eye view, sweeping overhead perspective, vast landscape visible
presets.description: Elevated aerial perspective from a drone, revealing patterns, scale, and spatial relationships invisible from ground level

presets.name: GoPro POV
presets.promptFragment: GoPro POV, ultra-wide action camera perspective, immersive first-person view, barrel distortion, high energy
presets.description: First-person point-of-view from an action camera with ultra-wide distortion conveying speed, immersion, and intensity

presets.name: Medium Format
presets.promptFragment: medium format camera, exceptional detail and tonal range, shallow depth of field, large sensor rendering
presets.description: Larger-than-35mm sensor producing images with unparalleled detail, tonal gradation, and a distinctive three-dimensional quality

presets.name: Pinhole
presets.promptFragment: pinhole camera aesthetic, infinite depth of field, soft overall focus, vignetting, long exposure feel
presets.description: Lensless camera producing dreamy, soft-focus images with infinite depth of field and natural vignetting

presets.name: Vintage Polaroid
presets.promptFragment: vintage Polaroid instant film, faded colors, soft focus, white border frame, nostalgic warmth, light leaks
presets.description: Instant film aesthetic with characteristic faded colors, soft focus, and the iconic white border frame
